On 26 April 2023, Russian forces shelled Antonivka, Kherson region. A police car patrolling the territory got under the shelling. Moreover, on that day, a reporter group of La Repubblica media got under the gunfire near Antonivskyi Bridge (coded to Antonivka, Kherson region). An Italian journalist was injured, a Ukrainian fixer accompanying him was killed. La Repubblica office suggests that the journalists, despite wearing distinctive vests with the 'Press' inscription, were ambushed by Russian snipers.

On 10 April 2023, Russian forces and Wagner group clashed with Ukrainian forces near Bakhmut, Donetsk. Russian forces made advances in northwestern and central Bakhmut. As a result of the shelling, 1 civilian was injured. During the day, Russian missile and artillery forces carried out 48 firing missions. The Ukrainian losses during the day amounted to more than 450 Ukrainian servicemen, including foreign fighters from the international legion, three tanks, three infantry fighting vehicles, six armored fighting vehicles, six vehicles, D-20 and MSTA-B howitzers, as well as two AN/TPQ-50 counter-battery radar stations.

On 10 April 2023, Russian forces shelled, assaulted, and were repulsed from Ukrainian positions near Khromove, Donetsk. Russian sources reported Russian advances northwest of Khromove. Casualties unknown.

On 10 April 2023, Russian forces shelled, assaulted, and were repulsed from Ukrainian positions near Makiivka, Luhansk. Russian forces occupied Ukrainian strongholds near Makiivka. Casualties unknown.

On 10 April 2023, Russian forces shelled, assaulted, and were repulsed from Ukrainian positions near Marinka, Donetsk. Russian forces advanced near the agricultural complex in southwestern Marinka. Additionally, Russian forces shot down a Ukrainian drone. Casualties unknown.

On 5 April 2023, Russian forces assaulted, clashed with Ukrainian forces and shelled near Bakhmut, Donetsk region, seeking to gain control over the entire territory of the city. Ukrainian forces shelled Russian infantry around Bakhmut. In total, on that day there were 21 armed clashes near Bakhmut, Bohdanivka and Ivanivske. Ukrainian forces repelled the Russian attack. On that day, according to Ukrainian sources, Ukrainian forces killed 88 and wounded 124 Russian soldiers, destroyed 3 UAVs, 3 field ammo depots and one radioelectronic combat system.

On 29 March 2023, Russian forces clashed with Ukrainian forces and shelled near Avdiivka, Donetsk region, with artillery and MLRS. On that day, Russian forces also launched an airborne missile strike at Avdiivka, having damaged a residential house and an empty kindergarten. Ukrainian forces repelled the Russian attack. Casualties unknown.

On 29 March 2023, Russian forces clashed with Ukrainian forces and shelled near Bakhmut, Donetsk region. In total, Ukrainian forces repelled 28 attacks during the day. Russian forces have made some territorial gains; the fighting seems to take place in the city center. On that day, Ukrainian forces also shot down a Russian Su-24 aircraft near Bakhmut. According to Ukrainian sources, 97 Russian soldiers were killed and 137 were wounded on that day near Bakhmut.
On 29 March 2023, Russian forces clashed with Ukrainian forces and shelled near Heorhiivka, Donetsk region. Ukrainian forces repelled the Russian attack. Casualties unknown.

On 29 March 2023, Russian forces clashed with Ukrainian forces and shelled near Marinka, Donetsk region. According to some sources, the Russian effort is focused on the northern part of the city. Ukrainian forces repelled the Russian attack. Casualties unknown.

According to Russian sources, on that day, up to 50 Ukrainian soldiers were killed, 2 military cars were destroyed on Kupiansk axis near Stelmakhivka, Hrianykivka, Synkivka and Novoselivske. (50 fatalities split across 4 events, 12 fatalities coded for this event)

Around 29 March 2023 (week of), Ukrainian forces clashed with Russian forces and Wagner Group near the road 0506 from Khromove to Chasiv Yar (coded to Khromove, Donetsk region), that was an important Ukrainian GLOC to Bakhmut. Ukrainian forces probably pushed the Wagner Group fighters back from the road. Casualties unknown.

Around 29 March 2023 (between 28 March - 29 March), Ukrainian forces shelled Russian positions on the occupied territory of Kherson region (coded to Kherson, Kherson region), having destroyed the motorboat prepared for use by the sabotage groups and an artillery transporter vehicle. Ukrainian forces also intercepted a Russian Orlan-10 UAV over Kherson region within that period. 12 Russian soldiers were killed.

On 22 March 2023, Russian forces clashed with Ukrainian forces near Bakhmut, Donetsk region. Ukrainian forces repelled the Russian attack. On the same day, Wagner Group clashed with Ukrainian border guards near Bakhmut, as a result of which 1 Wagner Group fighter was killed, 5 were injured. Russian forces also shelled Ukrainian positions near Bakhmut and Donbass. Realia reporters got under the fire. The journalists' car was damaged, no casualties. Further casualties unknown.

On 22 March 2023, Russian forces clashed with Ukrainian forces and shelled near Avdiivka, Donetsk region. During the day, Russian forces made 26 assaults on Avdiivka axis, Ukrainian forces repelled the Russian attacks. Ukrainian sources claim that on that day, at least 100 Russian soldiers were killed, 240 were injured, 2 tanks, 2 armored carriers, 4 IFVs, 2 radiolocation combat systems and artillery systems were destroyed.
On 22 March 2023, a civilian was killed, having accidentally activated an explosive while doing agricultural works near Chervone, Kherson region.
On 22 March 2023, a civilian was injured in Donetsk - Petrovskyi, Donetsk region, having accidentally activated a PFM-1 Lepestok anti-infantry landmine scattered by unidentified military forces.
On 22 March 2023, a civilian was injured, having accidentally activated an explosive device in a forest strip near Velyka Oleksandrivka, Kherson region.
On 22 March 2023, a civilian was killed, having accidentally activated a cluster munition in Ivanivka, Kharkiv region.
On 22 March 2023, 3 civilians were killed near Sadove, Mykolaiv region, when they drove across a field to a local forest strip to harvest firewood and their car ran over an anti-tank landmine.

On 22 March 2023, Russian forces shelled near Vovchansk, Kharkiv region. The engineers of Kharkiv regional power and energy maintenance service, who were dispatched to repair the grid, got under the shelling. They suspect that the shelling may be targeted, as it started when the team got to work. No casualties.
On 22 March 2023, Russian forces shelled Bakhmut, Donetsk region. 1 civilian was injured.
On 22 March 2023, Russian forces shelled Kostiantynivka, Donetsk region. 1 civilian was injured.
Around 22 March 2023 (week of), Russian forces shelled Prymorske, Zaporizhia region, having damaged the territory of a summer cottages block. 1 civilian was injured.
On 22 March 2023, Russian forces shelled Svyatohirsk, Donetsk region. 1 civilian was injured.

On 22 March 2023, Russian forces shelled Kherson, Kherson region, 5 times during the day, having damaged residential areas and causing a fire in a warehouse facility. In total, Kherson municipal community was shelled 11 times with 58 missiles on that day. 1 civilian was killed, 2 were injured.

On 22 March 2023, Russian forces launched a missile strike at Zaporizhia, Zaporizhia region, and Khortytsya island. In total, 6 missiles were launched, at least one Tornado-S MLRS missile hit the junction between 2 multi-apartment houses and severely damaged them. 2 civilians were killed, up to 34 were injured.

On 22 March 2023, Russian forces shelled Ukrainian positions near Zaliznychne, Zaporizhia region. Russian forces have destroyed a fuel depot of the 65-th Motorized Brigade of the Military Forces of Ukraine. Casualties unknown.

On 22 March 2023, Russian forces shelled Ukrainian positions near Dvorichna, Kharkiv region. Russian sources claim that on that day, up to 70 Ukrainian soldiers were killed, 1 IFV, 2 pickup cars, a BM-21 Grad MLRS system and a M777 artillery system were destroyed near Dvorichna, Berestove and Miasozharivka (70 fatalities split across 3 locations and coded as 23 in this event).

On 22 March 2023, Russian forces shelled Ukrainian positions near Novomykhaylivka, Donetsk region. Russian sources claim that on that day, up to 50 Ukrainian soldiers were killed, 1 D-20, 1 D-30 howitzers, 1 pickup truck and 3 cars were destroyed near Vuhledar and Novomykhaylivka (50 fatalities split across 2 locations and coded as 25 in this event).

data.notes: On 22 March 2023, Ukrainian forces launched a drone strike at the Russian positions in Sevastopol, Crimea. There were also reports on the use of naval drones. On 20 March 2023, Russian forces shelled, assaulted, and were repulsed from Ukrainian positions near Avdiivka, Donetsk. As a result of the shelling, 1 civilian was killed. Some Russian sources claim that Russian forces entered Avdiivka and fighting is taking place within the borders of the settlement. Further casualties unknown.

On 20 March 2023, Ukrainian forces repelled Russian attacks near Hryhorivka, Donetsk region. Wagner forces broke through Ukrainian defenses in the direction of Hryhorivka. Russian forces shelled near Hryhorivka. Russia claims that the Ukrainian losses in this direction included two armored combat vehicles, as well as D-20 and D-30 howitzers. Russia claims that up to 95 Ukrainian soldiers were killed in Nevske, Yampolivka and Hryhorivka. (95 fatalities split across three events, 32 fatalities coded in this event)
